description.translate: O sneaky morning, may I look forward to surprise you and be reborn again.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§9Miauletère\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Ô sournois matin, qu'il me tarde\"}","{\"text\":\"§7de te surprendre et renaître encore.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7O sneaky morning, may I look forward\"}","{\"text\":\"§7to surprise you and be reborn again.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a1 §7HUN§c-1\"}"]}}
